name: Keep It Alive (William Carlisle)
description:
Ludum Dare #46 Keep It Alive.

How To Play:

Stay Alive As Long As Possible While Filling Up The Plant For A Surprise.

Collect The Purple Blobs That Appear On The Ground And Place Them In The Plants  Tube By Walking To The Right Of It.

Buy Arrows From The Murchant Standing In The Top Middle Of The Map, Or Med Kits From The Nurse By Attacking (off-click) Near Them.

Controls:

Off-Click: Swing Your Sword.

Click: While Standing Still Will Shoot An Arrow.

Arrow Keys: Move And Turn, Use CTRL To  Turn Without Moving.

M: Use A Medic Kit.
